mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim is Our Command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, expecting a red carpet reception as the CEO, right? But get this-no red carpet. I mean, come on, the nerve! So, what do I do? I demand they roll out the red carpet, literally. And guess what? They did it! Ha, that's the power of being Hot Josh, baby!
